meanings.definition: A person who specializes in the field of electrochemistry.
meanings.sent1: The electrochemists conducted experiments to understand how electricity affects chemical reactions.
meanings.sent2: Many electrochemists work in laboratories to explore the connection between electricity and chemistry.
meanings.sent3: The electrochemists joked that they were like wizards mixing potions with the power of lightning.
meanings.sent4: In the world of science, electrochemists are like detectives unraveling the mysteries of electrical reactions.
meanings.sent5: The image of electrochemists huddled around bubbling beakers is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: The group of scientists who study the relationship between electricity and chemical reactions.
meanings.sent1: During the conference, the electrochemists shared their latest findings on electrical-chemical interactions.
meanings.sent2: As a team, the electrochemists discovered a new method to enhance battery performance.
meanings.sent3: The electrochemists playfully referred to themselves as the 'shockingly smart squad' in their research group.
meanings.sent4: The collaboration between physicists and electrochemists sparked innovative breakthroughs in energy storage.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of electrochemists to unraveling the secrets of electricity and chemistry is truly inspiring.
